text: Cowboy is a 1958 American western movie directed by Delmer Daves and based on the 1930 novel My Reminiscences of Cowboy by Frank Harris. It stars Glenn Ford, Jack Lemmon, Anna Kashfi, Dick York, Brian Donlevy and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1959. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Delmer Daves
title: Cowboy (movie)
